MemberSignature.Value: public static float HorizontalScrollbar (UnityEngine.Rect position, float value, float size, float leftValue, float rightValue);

Docs.summary: Make a horizontal scrollbar. Scrollbars are what you use to scroll through a document. Most likely, you want to use scrollViews instead.
Docs.returns: float - the modified value. This can be changed by the user by dragging the scrollbar, or clicking the arrows at the end.
